jProtocol.Abstract.Model

Class CommunicationChannel<T extends ProtocolDataUnit>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • jProtocol.Abstract.Model.CommunicationChannel<T>

  • public class CommunicationChannel<T extends ProtocolDataUnit>
extends java.util.Observable

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommunicationChannel(StateMachine<T> client, StateMachine<T> server)
      Creates a communication channel between client and server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T getPduToSend()
      Returns the current protocol data unit which will be sent when sendNextMessage() gets called.
      java.util.List<T> getSentProtocolDataUnits()
      Returns a list with all protocol data units which have been sent.
      void sendAllMessagesWithoutBreak()
      All messages will be sent without a paused thread, when this method has been called.
      void sendMessage(T pdu, StateMachine<T> sender)
      Sends a protocol data unit from sender.
      void sendNextMessage()
      Sends the next message, which has been set with sendMessage().

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommunicationChannel

        public CommunicationChannel(StateMachine<T> client,
                            StateMachine<T> server)
        Creates a communication channel between client and server.
        Parameters:
        client - the client state machine
        server - the server state machine

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage(T pdu,
                        StateMachine<T> sender)
        Sends a protocol data unit from sender. The current thread will be paused until the user clicks the next message button if sendAllMessagesWithoutBreak() has not been called before. A channel can just deliver a single message at the same time.
        Parameters:
        pdu - the protocol data unit
        sender - the sending state machine

      • sendNextMessage

        public void sendNextMessage()
        Sends the next message, which has been set with sendMessage(). Gets called from the UI thread.

      • sendAllMessagesWithoutBreak

        public void sendAllMessagesWithoutBreak()
        All messages will be sent without a paused thread, when this method has been called. Gets called from the UI thread.

      • getSentProtocolDataUnits

        public java.util.List<T> getSentProtocolDataUnits()
        Returns a list with all protocol data units which have been sent.
        Returns:
        the protocol data unit list

      • getPduToSend

        public T getPduToSend()
        Returns the current protocol data unit which will be sent when sendNextMessage() gets called.
        Returns:
        the current protocol data unit to be sent
